meanings.definition: Having many squiggles or wavy lines.
meanings.sent1: The squigglier drawing was full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent2: Her notebook was filled with squigglier doodles than mine.
meanings.sent3: The squigglier road on the map made the journey seem more adventurous.
meanings.sent4: The squigglier pattern on the fabric resembled a tangled web of lines.
meanings.sent5: The squigglier design caught everyone's attention with its intricate details.

meanings.sent1: The river looked squigglier after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: His signature was squigglier than hers, making it hard to read.
meanings.sent3: The squigglier path through the forest led to a hidden clearing.
meanings.sent4: The squigglier branches of the tree reached out in all directions.
meanings.sent5: The squigglier line on the graph showed a sharper increase in temperature.
